attributes.action: Tell us why it is right for banks to borrow taxpayer funds from the BofE at 0.5% and then charge those same taxpayers 7% to borrow that same money.
attributes.additional_details: Do you really believe that we are that easily conned.  You, our elected representatives, make it easy for the banks to make huge profits on OUR MONEY and then you tell us that keeping rates low is good for the country.  Just how much are you lot being backhanded by those banks that are ripping us off.
